subject: Automobile Racing
Monaco Grand Prix
lead_paragraph: Silverstone is the second-fastest track of the season after Monza, in Italy, and it is also one of the most difficult at which to set up the car, given the frequently windy and rainy conditions.
snippet: Silverstone is the second-fastest track of the season after Monza, in Italy, and it is also one of the most difficult at which to set up the car, given the frequently windy and rainy conditions.
